sentences: Liiklusõnnetusi esineb viimasel ajal üsna sageli.
context: The word 'rolli' appears to be the partitive form of the Estonian verb 'esinema', which means 'to appear' or 'to perform'. In the dictionary definition, 'esinema' is used in various contexts including public appearances (giving speeches), performances on stage/theater, participation in sports competitions, existing/occurring, representing oneself as someone/something, and reporting/presenting information. The partitive form 'rolli' would be used when indicating the role or part that one performs - similar to saying 'in the role of' or 'in the part of'.
